position: Assistant Manager at EXL || Alumni, IIT Kharagpur

positions.subtitle: Students'​ Alumni Cell, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: Worked under the Dean of Alumni Affairs, Team Students'​ Alumni Cell strives to establish and nurture the interaction between the Institute and the alumni. It has served as a platform facilitating communication between the current students of IIT Kharagpur and their predecessors. The team works on facets like Networking, Sponsorship, Publications and Events with an objective to keep the alumni connected to their Alma Mater and updated about the latest happenings in the Institute. We organize events like the Annual Alumni Meet (Reunion), Homecoming, Regional Student-Alumni Meet, Leadership Summit, Alumni Talks and carry on programmes like the Alumni-Student Mentorship to meet our objective.- Appointed as the PR Head, accountable for the Class Song, After Movie of the Annual Alumni Meet, Marketing strategies, Branding of Students' Alumni Cell.- Part of the apex executive body of the Students Alumni Cell that leads the student members, creative team and associates.- Leading the PR team which includes content writers, cinematographers, filmmakers, editors and marketing facets.
positions.title: PR head
positions.description_html:
Worked under the Dean of Alumni Affairs, Team Students'​ Alumni Cell strives to establish and nurture the interaction between the Institute and the alumni. It has served as a platform facilitating communication between the current students of IIT Kharagpur and their predecessors. The team works on facets like Networking, Sponsorship, Publications and Events with an objective to keep the alumni connected to their Alma Mater and updated about the latest happenings in the Institute. We organize events like the Annual Alumni Meet (Reunion), Homecoming, Regional Student-Alumni Meet, Leadership Summit, Alumni Talks and carry on programmes like the Alumni-Student Mentorship to meet our objective.

- Appointed as the PR Head, accountable for the Class Song, After Movie of the Annual Alumni Meet, Marketing strategies, Branding of Students' Alumni Cell.
- Part of the apex executive body of the Students Alumni Cell that leads the student members, creative team and associates.
- Leading the PR team which includes content writers, cinematographers, filmmakers, editors and marketing facets.

experience.title: Internship Trainee
experience.description: Designed and fabricated 6 carbon reinforced composite panels of varying thickness with different sized Teflon defects, to be used as a reference to perform non-destructive testing of various composite parts manufactured by the Aerospace composite division for fighter jets and helicopters.

positions.subtitle: Awaaz, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: Lead a team of 21 Junior Reporters and wrote various unbiased articles related to the surroundings and happenings at IIT Kharagpur.Performed Several Surveys Related to the daily life problems faced by the residents of IIT Kharagpur campus like mess food, Electricity and water supply, and reported them to the concerned authorities.Actively Reported the Sports, Cultural and Tech Inter Hall GC, IIT Kharagpur.Organised a Hindi fun debating competition “Panch Parmeshwar” during the annual cultural festival, Spring fest, IIT Kharagpur with around 60+ participants from various schools and universities.Led the Photography and Videography team of 6 Junior Reporters.
positions.title: Senior Reporter
positions.description_html:
Lead a team of 21 Junior Reporters and wrote various unbiased articles related to the surroundings and happenings at IIT Kharagpur.
Performed Several Surveys Related to the daily life problems faced by the residents of IIT Kharagpur campus like mess food, Electricity and water supply, and reported them to the concerned authorities.
Actively Reported the Sports, Cultural and Tech Inter Hall GC, IIT Kharagpur.
Organised a Hindi fun debating competition “Panch Parmeshwar” during the annual cultural festival, Spring fest, IIT Kharagpur with around 60+ participants from various schools and universities.
Led the Photography and Videography team of 6 Junior Reporters.
